name: Smoke: it's ok to feel
description:
Smoke: it's ok to feel is a strange little adventure game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 42

After a long day, Smoke the Bear likes to relax. He loves nothing better than to sit back and enjoy his favorite icy beverage, Space Lager©. However, when Smoke finds his fridge is empty, he realizes he's run out of Space Lager© and must make a trip to the local liquor store.

And thus, the adventure of a lifetime begins!

And thus, the adventure about a lifetime begins.

Explore a picturesque hand-drawn mountain town! Interact with a colorful cast of characters from Smoke's past. Or, screw all that, and go straight home and drink. It's up to you.   



Programming/Writing: UpstairsBreh

Art/sound design: LumpyTouch

Music generated using Abundant Music. Mastered by LumpTouch. Ending theme by LumpyTouch.

The game is played with arrow keys/mouse.

Special thanks to Noblelemon for generating the music. Special thanks to everyone who watched the stream!
